title: COP26: Poorest countries fear not reaching UK for climate summit
content:
1. COP26: Poorest countries fear not reaching UK for climate summit  BBC News
  2. Poor Countries Say Lack of Vaccines May Exclude Them From Climate Talks  U.S. News & World Report
  3. UK planning last-ditch China climate talks to break impasse before Cop26  The Guardian
  4. COP26 protesters in Glasgow won't need vaccine passport as discussions continue over delegates  Daily Record
  5. Poor countries say lack of COVID-19 vaccines may exclude them from global climate conference  The Globe and Mail
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
